title: DON'T MISS THIS! 3BD HOME IN BAYVIEW MINUTES TO MISSION BAY!
posting_body: ['August Special!', 'Get $500 rent credit if lease is signed on or before August 15, 2022!', 'This 3-bedroom home in an ideal Bayview location is ready for love!', 'Moments to public transportation, minutes to Mission Bay, 3rd Street, and AT&T Park.', 'Abundant natural light streaming through oversized windows and gleaming hardwood floors throughout greet you as you enter this home!', 'Enjoy indoor lounging in the spacious living room with views of the vibrant neighborhood.', 'Indulge in home cooking in your charming U-shaped kitchen, with easy-care tiled countertops, generous cabinetry, and ready-to-use appliances.', 'Good-sized bedrooms with more-than-ample closet space await, ready to give you a great night’s rest after a long day.', 'Two bedrooms have private access to the rooftop patio - perfect for morning coffee.', 'Indulge in a relaxing soak in the sleek full bath, fitted with a shower/bathtub combo before hitting the hay!', 'Your new home is perfect for planting roots!', 'Near restaurants, shopping, schools, errands, and entertainment.', 'Easy access to highways 101, 280, SFO, and Downtown SF.', 'Lease Term: 12 months', "Deposit Amount: One month's rent", 'Pet Deposit: $500', 'Included In Rent:', 'Water', 'Gas', 'Sewage', 'HOME ID: 45fb13c5b55aaa93']
